Name: Riddle Girl
About the game: 'Riddle Girl' is a casual puzzle game in which all you have to do is replace parts of a picture, gradually building up a complete drawing. The game allows you to cheat, you can unlock any image after 25 seconds. When you have completed the puzzle, you can view the finished images in the gallery at any time. There is no time limit in the game for solving puzzles. FEATURES ▪ 15 images ▪ Shuffle the fragments ▪ Cheat mode 25 seconds after starting the puzzle. ▪ Puzzles: 3х2, 3х3, 4х4 and 5x5. ▪ Your progress is saved in the gallery. ▪ Relaxing, enjoyable music ▪ Multiple soundtracks
